verbs.description: [ARG0: jcope chair] [V: defends] [ARG1: commission silence on probes] [ARGM-LOC: at the monthly meeting of the state ethics and lobbying watchdog panel] [ARGM-TMP: on tuesday] its chairman michael rozen issued a statement defending the fact that officials of the joint commission on public ethics have repeatedly declined to comment on possible investigations republican state sen john defrancisco a candidate for governor has blasted jcope over his belief that it is not probing the activities of former top cuomo administration official joe percoco in particular his extensive use of a desk and phone at the governor governmental office during the eight months he was running cuomo 2014 re - election campaign john defrancisco commission joe percoco cuomo jcope the commission federal prosecutors albany california manhattan joint commission on public ethics
